li.p: Make sure to enter the patient information correctly during patient registration. Any inconsistency in the patient information will cause misdiagnosis.

Shut down and exit the system timely after completing the operation, and develop good and correct operating habits, in order to optimize the operation process and equipment operation condition, and to improve the work efficiency.
Objects should be correctly selected before all operations, such as adjusting window width/level, and saving and deleting images.

conbody.p: This system supply with features of Dose check (dose notification and dose alert), Automatic Exposure Control, DICOM structured dose report, and reference protocols.The features will help perform optimization/management of doses of ionizing radiation while still enabling the system to deliver the diagnostic image quality needed by the physician. Even with such attributes on the equipment, clinicians must ensure that operators are trained and knowledgeable of the functions and operations of these attributes in addition to facilities radiation management policies and procedures.
